casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Francisco NAVARRO Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided June 21, 2017

Deren Manasevit, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

James A. Killen, senior assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 172 Conn.App. 472, 160 A.3d 1116 (2017), is denied.
